net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.event

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.event.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionEvent, ColumnModelEvent, ComponentEvent, ErrorEvent, ItemEvent, ListDataEvent, ListSelectionEvent, LocaleSelector.LocaleSelectionEvent, NotificationEvent, PageableEvent, TableModelEvent, TreeExpansionEvent, TreeModelEvent, TreeSelectionEvent

    public abstract class Event
extends EventObject
    Base class for events.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        protected Event(Object source,
     Component com,
     int priority)
        Create a new event. The Component argument is used to determine the Window and WindowManager arguments and may be null. The Component is not kept in the Event object.
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the event.
        com - The Component used to determine the Window and WindowManager.
        priority - The priority.
        See Also:
        Event(java.lang.Object, WindowManager, Window, int)

      • Event

        protected Event(Object source,
     int priority)
        Create a new event. The WindowManager and Window are null.
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the event.
        priority - The priority.
        See Also:
        Event(java.lang.Object, WindowManager, Window, int)

      • Event

        protected Event(Object source,
     MIWTSession session,
     Window win,
     int priority)
        Create a new Event. The source of the event may be any object but should be the object that fired the event. For example, if a component fires an event when it is hidden, the source should be the component. A data model should fire events when the model changes, the source therefore should be the model.
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the event.
        session - The MIWTSession, may be null.
        win - The Window the component or object is in, may be null.
        priority - The priority of the event, lower values should be processed first.

      • Event

        protected Event(Object source,
     WindowManager wm,
     Window win,
     int priority)
        Create a new Event. The source of the event may be any object but should be the object that fired the event. For example, if a component fires an event when it is hidden, the source should be the component. A data model should fire events when the model changes, the source therefore should be the model.
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the event.
        wm - The WindowManager, may be null.
        win - The Window the component or object is in, may be null.
        priority - The priority of the event, lower values should be processed first.

      • getEventId

        public long getEventId()
        Get the event ID.
        Returns:
        long.

      • getPriority

        public int getPriority()
        Get the event priority. The lesser the value the higher priority. Typically events that change component values are higher priority than action events so that the values will be updated before any action is taken.
        Returns:
        int.

      • getRequest

        public static net.proteusframework.internet.http.Request getRequest()

        Returns:
        the request.
        Throws:

      • isInRequestResponseCycle

        public static boolean isInRequestResponseCycle()

        Returns:
        true if processing a request.
